description: The HpeEvent object extends the Redfish Event resource with additional HPE functionality.

items.description: This is a an object that represenets Advanced Diagnostic information.  It is currently schemed to allow anything in the object.

CorrelatedEventNumber.description: This indicates the unique identification number for the event log type specified in CorrelatedEventType, according to the definitions of EventNumber in the HpeLogEntry.

CorrelatedEventTimeStamp.description: This indicates the date and time of the latest log entry update, according to the definitions of Updated in the HpeLogEntry.

CorrelatedEventType.description: This indicates the corresponding event log type specific to the management processor.

CorrelatedIndications.description: A list of identifiers whose notifications are correlated with (related to) this one.

OriginalResourceEtag.description: This indicates the ETag of the affected resource specified in OriginOfCondition.

Resource.description: This is a link of the resource that has changed (post-change).

title: #HpeEvent.v2_1_0.HpeEvent
